question: Which state government passed Prevention and Eradication of Inhuman Evil Practices and Black Magic Bill, 2017?
explanation: Karnataka Legislative Assembly unanimously passed 'Karnataka Prevention and Eradication of Inhuman Evil Practices and Black Magic Bill, 2017'. This anti-superstition bill is aimed at preventing and eradicating inhuman evil practices propagated and performed in the name of black magic by conman to exploit the common people.
